item.title: Slippery slope of collecting your rent payments for any investment or rental property owner.
item.itunes:author: Craig Williams
item.itunes:subtitle: Slippery Slope Of Rent Collecting
item.itunes:summary: In this podcast Allison reads the article titled The slippery slope of rent collecting for any investment or rental property owner. This podcast details the situation where a couple of months can snowball into a big problem for a landlord

item.title: Scheduling A Real Estate Rehab Project.
item.itunes:author: Craig Williams
item.itunes:summary: In this podcast I talk about what I did to schedule a recent rehab project that my brother was working on. Be sure to consult your lawyer or real estate professional before making any major real estate investing decisions.

item.title: meth Labs And Investment Property
item.itunes:author: Craig Williams
item.itunes:summary: In this podcast I talk about a article I read about meth labs and investment property. The article talks about a retired couple who faced clean-up costs totaling 84,000 for a rental property used in the production of meth. The really bad twist on this story is that the house only appraised for $72,000. They also tell about another homeowner who had to pay $60,000 to decontaminate a property used to make meth, That was the largest total since the law took effect in 2005. Caoimhin Connel said about the clean-up “they can run from a couple of hundred dollars to a couple of hundred thousand dollars” As always consult a lawyer or a real estate professional before making any major real estate investing decisions.
item.description: In this podcast I talk about a article I read about meth labs and investment property. The article talks about a retired couple who faced clean-up costs totaling 84,000 for a rental property used in the production of meth. The really bad twist on this story is that the house only appraised for $72,000. They also tell about another homeowner who had to pay $60,000 to decontaminate a property used to make meth, That was the largest total since the law took effect in 2005. Caoimhin Connel said about the clean-up “they can run from a couple of hundred dollars to a couple of hundred thousand dollars” As always consult a lawyer or a real estate professional before making any major real estate investing decisions.
item.itunes:keywords: meth labs,investment property,rental property,real estate, investing in real estate

item.title: When Am I Going To Feel Comfortable Investing In Real Estate
item.itunes:author: Craig Williams
item.itunes:summary:
In this podcast I talk about the question of when am I going to feel comfortable Investing in real estate. I have had many questions from listeners and readers about needing even more information before they are able to invest in a investment property. The first question that you have to ask yourself is what are you getting this information for. Read and get as much information as you can for the first couple of months. Use books, podcasts, and blogs to gain as much knowledge as you can. You should always continue to educate yourself and keep up on new developments in the future. But if your researching to get rid of all doubt in your investing you may never get to that point.
And as always consult your lawyer or real estate professional before making any major real estate investing decisions.
item.description:
In this podcast I talk about the question of when am I going to feel comfortable Investing in real estate. I have had many questions from listeners and readers about needing even more information before they are able to invest in a investment property. The first question that you have to ask yourself is what are you getting this information for. Read and get as much information as you can for the first couple of months. Use books, podcasts, and blogs to gain as much knowledge as you can. You should always continue to educate yourself and keep up on new developments in the future. But if your researching to get rid of all doubt in your investing you may never get to that point.
And as always consult your lawyer or real estate professional before making any major real estate investing decisions.
item.itunes:keywords: investing in real estate,rental property,investment property,real estate,real estate investing,

item.title: Looking For Investment Property With A Real Estate Agent.
item.itunes:author: Craig Williams
item.itunes:summary: In this podcast I talk about one way of finding investment property and that is your local real estate agent. I go into what to look for in a agent and how to find the right agent for you as a investor. Be sure to consult a lawyer or a real estate profesional before making any major real estate investing decisions.
